Package backend

Class TextObject

java.lang.Object
backend.PollyObject
backend.ColorfulObject
backend.TextObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Comment, InteractiveTextBox
public abstract class TextObject
extends ColorfulObject
implements java.io.Serializable
A type of colorful object that strictly deals with text/strings.
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • TextObject

      public TextObject​(processing.core.PApplet sketch, float x, float y, float strokeWeight, int[] fillColor, int[] boarderColor, java.lang.String str, java.lang.String font, float textSize)
      Constructor for ColorfulObject
      Parameters:
      sketch - A reference to a PApplet to allow general functionality of the processing library
      x - A float to represent the initial x starting position (in pixels) of the object, should be a slide-relative coordinate
      y - A float to represent the initial y starting position (in pixels) of the object, should be a slide-relative coordinate
      strokeWeight - Represents the line-thickness
      fillColor - The internal color of the object represented by four values ranged 0-255 (Red, Green, Blue, and Alpha respectively)
      boarderColor - The outline color of the object represented by three values ranged 0-255 (Red, Green, and Blue respectively)
      str - The text to be displayed
      font - The font style to display the text as
      textSize - The size of text to be displayed in pixels
